cloudMigration.title: Welcome to OpenWhispr Pro
cloudMigration.description: Your 7-day free trial is active! We've switched your transcription to OpenWhispr Cloud for faster, more accurate results. Your previous settings are saved - switch back anytime in Settings.

aiCta.title: Enhance your transcriptions with AI
aiCta.description: Automatically fix grammar, punctuation, and formatting as you speak.

gpu.bannerDescription: Enable GPU acceleration for faster performance.

mode.localDescription: Runs on your device. Complete privacy, works offline.
mode.cloudDescription: Advanced models via API. Fast and capable, requires internet.

custom.endpointWithProtocol: Enter a full base URL including protocol (for example, https://server/v1).

custom.endpointUnauthorized: Endpoint rejected the request (401/403). Add an API key or adjust server auth settings.

dictionary.description: Teach the AI your vocabulary — names, jargon, and terms it might otherwise miss

dictionary.wordsAppearHere: Words you add will appear here
dictionary.howItWorksDescription: Words are fed as context hints to the speech model, helping it recognize uncommon terms. For difficult words, try adding context like "The word is Synty" alongside the word itself.
dictionary.tipDescription: Separate multiple words with commas. Add context phrases like "The word is Synty" for better recognition.
